A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is tearing me apart.
It has wonderful and epic moments but also scenes I wasn't far away from a facepalm.
The midpart was way too long and in my opinion the whole Finn arc could've been cut and I like him very much. The Casino planet didn't feel like a Star Wars Planet. It didn't fit.
Another problem were the gags. I laughed at every single one\, but there were way too many and some of them made serious moments into funny ones. 
My last complaint is the number of Plottwist. Too many that single twist lost its value. 

I don't hate it but I can't love it either. It has too many problems but\, in my opinion the last third has so many magic moments\, that it is still a movie you should watch\, but don't expect too much.
After the holidays I'll watch it a second time without false hope and expectations.
